weeklyEmail.teaser: Coming out weekly on Sunday nights, this email is your source for all things DS.

item.name: Freshman Picnic
item.info:
As per tradition, we are having a picnic at Eastwoods park in honor of our new freshmen!
We will meet in front of Carothers dormitory at 4:45pm to meet up and walk over as a group. There will be BBQ and other delicious food.

item.name: Submitting Your News Item
item.info:
If you have an event that you would like included in the weekly email, send an email to r.ellis.michael@gmail.com with the following:
  • "[DSNewsSubmission] TITLE_OF_YOUR_ITEM" in the subject line
  • Information about your item
  • The date of the event or item, if applicable
  • The location of the event, if applicable
  • The deadline until which you would like the news item to run
To have your item included in the weekly email, it must be submitted by Saturday at midnight.
